name: Dimension Dueler
description:
A short game about enviroment-based combat and 𝒹𝒾𝓂𝑒𝓃𝓈𝒾𝑜𝓃𝒶𝓁 𝓂𝒶𝓃𝒾𝓅𝓊𝓁𝒶𝓉𝓊𝑜𝓃, made for the Pygame Community Summer Jam 2022 (Theme: Dimensions). Feedback is of course appreciated. (and yes I know I can't draw very well) :)

Controls:

Move - W A S D
Interact - SPACEBAR
Sprint - SHIFT
Inventory/Undo Action - ESCAPE
Show Dimension - UP/DOWN ARROWS / MOUSEWHEEL
Draw Card - E
Finish Turn - F
